parameters.name: BackupRetentionPeriod
parameters.description: The number of days for which data backup files are retained. Default value: 7. Maximum value: 7. Valid values: 1 to 7.

parameters.name: EnableRecoveryPoint
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic point-in-time backup.

*   true
*   false

Default value: true.

parameters.name: PreferredBackupPeriod
parameters.description:
The cycle based on which backups are performed. If more than one day of the week is specified, the days of the week are separated by commas (,). Valid values:

*   Monday
*   Tuesday
*   Wednesday
*   Thursday
*   Friday
*   Saturday
*   Sunday

parameters.name: PreferredBackupTime
parameters.description: The backup window. Specify the backup window in the HH:mmZ-HH:mmZ format. The backup window must be in UTC. Default value: 00:00-01:00.

parameters.name: RecoveryPointPeriod
parameters.description:
The frequency of point-in-time backup.

*   1: per hour
*   2: per 2 hours
*   4: per 4 hours
*   8: per 8 hours

Default value: 8.
